description: NRCan requires a Temporary Help Services
full_summary:
```markdown
# NRCan-5000069118: Stream 3.2 Engineer - Electrical, Intermediate Level (Multiple Languages)
[Details](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4253/npp.pdf)

## Tender Notice Summary
### English
Natural Resources Canada invites proposals for the provision of Engineer – Electrical, Intermediate Level services to support our departmental activities. The selected contractor will provide expert advice and support to our engineers and technical staff.

### French
Ressources naturelles Canada invite les propositions pour la fourniture des services Ingénieur électricien – niveau intermédiaire pour soutenir nos activités départementales. La société sélectionnée fournit des conseils et appuis experts à nos ingénieurs et au personnel technique.

### Tender Details
#### AMENDMENT 2
- **Solicitation Number**: NRCan-5000069118
- **Amendment Number**: 2
- **Publication Date**: March 17, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: March 29, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
- **Contracting Entity**: Natural Resources Canada
- **Procurement Category**: SRV
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering
- **Trade Agreements**: None

## Requirements

- **Level of Effort**: Estimated 1800 hours (48 weeks) over the contract period
- **Contract Duration**: April 1, 2023 to February 29, 2024 (unless otherwise specified)

## Contact Information
- **Name**: Jinping Wei
- **Email**: [jinping.wei@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:jinping.wei@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: (343) 541-7931
- **Address**: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E4, Canada

## Notice URL and Attachments
Please refer to the attached [document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4253/npp.pdf) for more details.
```

I made the following changes:

* Simplified the title to include the relevant information
* Provided a brief introduction to the tender notice in both English and French
* Removed unnecessary information such as the reference number
* Emphasized the key requirements of the tender notice
* Corrected grammar
